channel.title: New site
channel.description:
Well, I really never got to showcase my site considering I've been so busy >.>
Anyways: http://freeflyin.com *note, im not offering any of you my paid services (im sure you don't want them anyways)
Please crit.
btw: Taharok approved this over msn.

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote="_saporta, post:24, topic:298306"][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=394705.msg2939690#msg2939690 date=1251773397]
1No, your still an idiot. 2Fastbawlz actually knew what he was talking about. 3All you said that was the same: its to general and the logo needs work.

Also: 4Fastbawlz website are decent, and is good at graphic design.
[/quote]

  1. Please explain.
  2. As I would mindlessly take time to post my critique on here, I know as well.
  3. [quote author=_saporta link=topic=394705.msg2933551#msg2933551 date=1251416723]
    Moderate banner
    Lovely Navigation
    Nice Colours
    Nice Padding
    Nice Buttons (facebook, twitter, rss, del.ico.us)
    Nice Button Area
    Uncrispy font
    [/quote]
  4. Doesn’t take a genius to criticize. Getting criticism from graphic enhanced/experienced members could perhaps almost be as effective as a noob criticism, as you’re trying to make it appeal to all audiences.

Now I know what’s gonna happen, all are going to take sides just 'cause he’s a more respected member.
I conjecture flame.[/quote]

A noob knows nothing of criticism, and for someone who has been doing graphic design for quite a while know, would know much more.
And why did you change your quotes?

Read full topic

item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“quest rs, post:22, topic:298306”]I really like your clean layout.

ps my web design teacher from last year would’ve failed you in the entire course (even if you were getting 100% in the course) for that broken link :P[/quote]

Well, it makes sense. If this were for class, it would be done

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote="_saporta, post:2, topic:298306"]Mehh… seems a little too generic, a lot of sites are like that, but no exactly.
Looks a lot like a word press or some type.
Regardless of being generic or not, it seems OK.
6/10[/quote][quote=“FastBawlz, post:17, topic:298306”]The website is boring.
It has boring colors, typography, and design.
It just looks like every other site out there, nothing stand out to me.
The logo is also pretty disgusting looking, I don’t know why.

Umm, use Lorem Ipsum for the posts and what not, especially if you’re going to type badly. It distracts from the design.[/quote]

No, your still an idiot. Fastbawlz actually knew what he was talking about. All you said that was the same: its to general and the logo needs work.

Also: Fastbawlz website are decent, and is good at graphic design.

Read full topic

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @Starting_up Starting up ...
item.description:
@Starting_up wrote:

[quote="_saporta, post:19, topic:298306"][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=394705.msg2938539#msg2938539 date=1251715814]
The website is boring.
It has boring colors, typography, and design.
It just looks like every other site out there, nothing stand out to me.
The logo is also pretty disgusting looking, I don’t know why.

Umm, use Lorem Ipsum for the posts and what not, especially if you’re going to type badly. It distracts from the design.
[/quote]
finally, someone with the same thoughts as I.

No you’re an idiot. This is really good, I like the header and the logo, as well as the digg/rss etc buttons.

r u gana call him an idiot too?[/quote]at lest he aintz talkun lik diz

Read full topic

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:17, topic:298306”]The website is boring.
It has boring colors, typography, and design.
It just looks like every other site out there, nothing stand out to me.
The logo is also pretty disgusting looking, I don’t know why.

Umm, use Lorem Ipsum for the posts and what not, especially if you’re going to type badly. It distracts from the design.[/quote]
Thanks, and I don’t find the colors much boring at all (imo), but yes, the logo isn’t the best, considering I don’t know typography worth shit.[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:299283"][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=394705.msg2933484#msg2933484 date=1251414528]
Well, I really never got to showcase my site considering I’ve been so busy >.>

Anyways: http://freeflyin.com
*note, im not offering any of you my paid services (im sure you don’t want them anyways)

Please crit.

btw: Taharok approved this over msn.
[/quote]

It looks a little bit bland. Colour it up, use pictures, make it more alive.[/quote]
It is color’d enough? I got 4-5 different colors on there, if I had more, it would distract the user.

Just my opinion though, but also thanks for the feedback.

Edit: Can you please show me sites that seem perfect to you? PM me or something.

Read full topic

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

The website is boring.
It has boring colors, typography, and design.
It just looks like every other site out there, nothing stand out to me.
The logo is also pretty disgusting looking, I don’t know why.

Umm, use Lorem Ipsum for the posts and what not, especially if you’re going to type badly. It distracts from the design.

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:15, topic:298306”][quote author=cane link=topic=394705.msg2934235#msg2934235 date=1251467280]

$500 for 5 pages! i thought that charging £50 for 5 was a lot

Well, I googl’d prices, and most of them are more expensive. And you don’t really want to under charge =/ its bad for the other locals who freelance web design.

why should you care about other freelance web designers there prices are not very reasonable. To be honest it would take me around 4-8 hours to design, create, test and perfect 5 pages so i would not charge anywhere near that. Although it would depend on the type of job that you are undertaking but if it was just html and css i would charge £50 max
[/quote]
4-8 hours is much time you know. I’m always busy with school, sports, and so on. And the reason is why you should care about other freelancers: they make a living off it.[/quote]
Not really because its not a straight 4-8 hours i included time for breaks nd watching some tele as thats what i normally do half way through, and you should not care about how they make a living. If they stop getting there customers then they will change there job.

Read full topic

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

Server-Unknown.Net:

You should make a blog too, to attract more visitors. I discovered 2 days ago that bloggers get way more attention than the usual portfolio/card site nowadays from Jacob Cass’s interview (He owns the Just Creative Design website). If you check out his blog you will learn a lot about typography and logos to help improve your sites outstanding look.

Yes, I suck at typography. And I did make a blog before (a wordpress theme) but I don’t think i have a copy of it… =/ I will just make another one, but yes, thank you everyone who commented.

Read full topic

item.title: New site
item.dc:creator: @_saporta _saporta
item.description:
@_saporta wrote:

fellixombc:

Please explain to me how this looks like a wordpress tempmlate? And if it were a wordpress template, why would it matter?

I had a website who’s control panel had a wordpress plug-in installer, and the wordpress looks a lot like it. I cancelled it now, and the hosting was dot5hosting.
Doesn’t matter tbh, was just pointing it out.
It’s simple and nice, but it’s not booming enough to get anything higher than a 6/10 for me.

Here:
Moderate banner
Lovely Navigation
Nice Colours
Nice Padding
Nice Buttons (facebook, twitter, rss, del.ico.us)
Nice Button Area
Uncrispy font

Just get some type of unique logo, and put it on your banner. I’m not going to create one since I suck at it, although it seems like something pointing in a ~70 degree angle would work.

ex:

ofc don’t using that poorly vectored dinosaur i google’d, and use something that blends with the text.

Read full topic
